title: How Much Internet Speed Do You Really Need?
excerpt: Calculate the right internet plan for your household or business needs.
description: A practical guide to determining your internet speed requirements based on usage patterns and number of users.
author: Ditel Network Team
content: For basic browsing and email, 10-25 Mbps suffices. Streaming HD video requires 25-50 Mbps, while 4K streaming and gaming need 100+ Mbps. For households with 5+ devices or remote workers, consider 200-500 Mbps plans. Businesses should calculate based on employee count and applications.
